name: Sherwood Shooter - Apple Shooter
description:
Test your aim with the Internet hit Sherwood Shooter!

Carefully pierce the apple perched on the knight's head. With 8 wacky ways to kill him, you won't be too disappointed if you miss!

With increasing distance comes increasing difficulty not to accidentally kill the knight and the challenge is to beat your high score time after time and brag to your friends on Facebook.
